```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library('dplyr')
library('tibble')
```

# Introduction

```{r tibble}
df <- tibble(x = 1:3, y = 3:1)
print(df)

print(filter(df, x == 1))
#> # A tibble: 1 x 2
#>       x     y
#>   <int> <int>
#> 1     1     3
```
